name: Loot n' Scoot
description:
This was my second LD. I’m a programmer by trade, so the hardest part of LD for me is the art/sound. I hope it reads well and isn’t too fugly. I’m also a very newbie guitarist, and not really musically inclined, but I managed to record 3 little original ‘songs’ this time, which is a first ever.

Tools:
  • Unity
  • Inkscape
  • Audacity
Change Log: 1.0.0:
  • First upload
